comments:
Build: Callisto 3.2

To reproduce:

1. Install Sleak

2. Launch WTP

3. Window > Preferences... > Add... > Click on the browse workspace icon

4. Cancel out from the preference page

5. Using Sleak, take a SWT resource snap shot

6. Window > Preferences... > Add... > Click on the browse workspace icon

7. Cancel out from the preference page

8. Using Sleak, take a SWT resource diff. The following images/colors were leaked. We need to deallocate these SWT resources.

Image 1:

Craig, can you look into this?  Is this something we can fix for 1.5.1?
I have a fix for this bug. Changing priority to P2 for consideration in the WTP 1.5.1 release. I'll attach a patch.

Created an attachment (id=47877)
Patch for wst.common.ui

Created an attachment (id=47878)
Patch for wst.xml.ui
This is part of a "mass update" where bugs showing "fixed" between 7/1/2006 and 9/27/2006 are assumed fixed in WTP 1.5.1. feel free to change the target milestone if you know a more accurate setting.
